summary: Prahaar is the story of Major Chavan, a tough and stern soldier, trained to destroy the enemy. He can see the enemy on our borders but is unaware of the invisible enemy within ourselves. ... See full summary Â»
cast: Nana Patekar|Dimple Kapadia|Gautam Joglekar|Madhuri Dixit|Habib Tanvir|Makrand Deshpande|Achyut Potdar|Sai Deodhar|Jahangir Khan|Ankush Mohite|Malhar Patekar|Vishwajeet Pradhan|Yagnesh Shetty|Aadesh Shrivastava|Shivkumar Subramaniam
title: Prahaar: The Final Attack
